TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlMethodAttribute extends Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFunctionAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlMethodAttribute Inherits SqlFunctionAttribute

summary.span: 表示使用者定義型別 (UDT) 之方法或屬性的決定機制和資料存取屬性。

span.span: Indicates the determinism and data access properties of a method or property on a user-defined type (UDT).

summary.span: 該屬性 (Attribute) 上的屬性 (Property) 反映使用 SQL Server 註冊型別時使用的實體特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics that are used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性，應該直接使用 setter 或 getter。For a property, the should be used on the setter or the getter directly. 繼承自，因此繼承`FillRowMethodName`和`TableDefinition`欄位從。 inherits from a , so inherits the `FillRowMethodName` and `TableDefinition` fields from . 請注意，它不可能撰寫資料表值的方法，雖然這些欄位的名稱可能很可能會建議。Note that it is not possible to write a table-valued method, although the names of these fields might suggest that it is possible. ## Examples 下列範例示範 UDT 方法的屬性表示的方法將不會叫用此類型的 null 執行個體方法不會變更類型的狀態和，將不會呼叫方法時`null`參數提供的方法引動過程。The following example shows a UDT method that is attributed to indicate that the method will not be invoked on null instances of the type, that the method will not change the state of the type, and that the method will not be called when `null` parameters are supplied to the method invocation. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlMethodAttribute Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用者定義型別 (UDT) 上的屬性 (Attribute)，用於表示 UDT 之方法或屬性 (Property) 的決定機制和資料存取屬性 (Property)。

span.span: An attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to indicate the determinism and data access properties of a method or a property on a UDT.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InvokeIfReceiverIsNull { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指示 SQL Server 是否應在 null 執行個體上叫用方法。

span.span: Indicates whether SQL Server should invoke the method on null instances.

value.span: 如果 SQL Server 應在 null 執行個體上叫用方法則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if SQL Server should invoke the method on null instances; otherwise, .

value.span: 如果此方法不能叫用 （由於方法屬性），SQL Server傳回。

span.span: If the method cannot be invoked (because of an attribute on the method), the SQL Server is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為屬性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 也就是說，方法是不叫用的 null 執行個體。That is, the method is not invoked on a null instance. 如果為 true，傳回值的方法取決於它的型別。If is true, the return value of the method depends upon its type. 如果該方法的傳回型別可為 null，則會傳回辨別的類型的 null 值。If the return type of the method is nullable, the distinguished null value for the type is returned. 如果傳回的型別不可為 null，則會傳回類型的預設 CLR 值。If the return type is non-nullable, the default CLR value for the type is returned. 參考類型的預設值為 null。The default value for reference types is null. 當您呼叫預設建構函式的型別時傳回的值為實值類型的預設值。The default value for a value type is the value that is returned when you call the default constructor for the type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMutator { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出使用者定義型別 (UDT) 上的方法是否為更動子。

span.span: Indicates whether a method on a user-defined type (UDT) is a mutator.

value.span: 如果方法是更動子，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the method is a mutator; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`true`和方法的傳回型別是`void`，SQL Server 會將標示為 mutator 方法。If the property is set to `true` and the return type of the method is `void`, SQL Server marks the method as a mutator. Mutator 方法就是導致 UDT 執行個體的狀態變更。A mutator method is one that causes a state change in the UDT instance. Mutator 方法可以在指派陳述式或資料修改陳述式，呼叫，但不能用在查詢中。Mutator methods can be called in assignment statements or data modification statements, but cannot be used in queries. 如果方法標示為 mutator，但不會傳回 void，然後建立型別不會因發生錯誤。If a method is marked as a mutator but does not return void, then CREATE TYPE does not fail with an error. 即使以外傳回值`void`會引發錯誤，傳回的值無法存取，因此無法使用。Even though a returned value other than `void` does not raise an error, the returned value is not accessible and cannot be used. 預設值屬性是`false`。The default value of the property is `false`. 如果屬性可以是 mutator setter 上使用和設`true`。A property can be a mutator if is used on the setter and is set to `true`. 不過，屬性 setter 會隱含地視為 mutator，如此就不需要設定屬性至`true`。However, a property setter is implicitly treated as a mutator, so it is not necessary to set the property of the to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool OnNullCall { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出在方法引動過程中指定 輸入引數時是否呼叫使用者定義型別 (UDT) 上的方法。

span.span: Indicates whether the method on a user-defined type (UDT) is called when input arguments are specified in the method invocation.

value.span: 如果方法會在方法引動過程中指定 輸入引數時呼叫，則為 ；如果方法的任何輸入參數為 時傳回 值，則為 。

span.span: if the method is called when input arguments are specified in the method invocation; if the method returns a value when any of its input parameters are .

value.span: 如果此方法不能叫用 （由於方法屬性），SQL Server傳回。

span.span: If the method cannot be invoked (because of an attribute on the method), the SQL Server is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是`true`。The default value of the property is `true`.
